attributes.action: Honour Scotland's claim on Doncaster by giving them power over Doncaster
attributes.additional_details: Doncaster was signed over to the Scottish in the 12th century in a treaty that we must go through with.
attributes.background: Scotland has a legitimate claim to Doncaster which should be honored by Parliament and her majesty the queen

rejection.details: Decisions about the governance of Doncaster are a matter for the people of Doncaster. We could accept a petition calling on the UK Government to hold a referendum on whether Doncaster wishes to become part of Scotland, although taking over responsibility for Doncaster would also require the consent of the Scottish Government.
